definition: to bare one's left arm and take off one's cap as an expression of sorrow
to excuse sb/to exempt/to remove or dismiss from office/to avoid/to avert/to escape/to be prohibited
(old) candidate who has successfully passed the first grades of the examination system, but not yet the court examination (殿試|殿试[dian4 shi4])
temple name of a deceased Chinese emperor
Classic of Rites (same as 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4])
Guliang Annals, commentary on the Spring and Autumn Annals 春秋[Chun1 qiu1], first published during the Han Dynasty
to bestow a surname (of emperor conferring favor on ethnic group)
to die of old age/to live to a ripe old age/(fig.) (of sth) to come to an end (after a long period of service)
to sacrifice one's life by loyalty (to one's prince, one's husband etc)
